addPauseRule(uint64,uint64).details: Add the pause rule to the account. Restricted to the owner

cleanOutdatedRules().details: Cleans up outdated pause rules by removing them from the mapping

confirmDataProvider(uint8).details: Part of the two step process to set a new Data Provider within a Protocol AppManager

confirmOwner().details: This function confirms a new appManagerAddress that was put in storage. It can only be confirmed by the proposed address

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the app manager address used for permissions. This is required for upgrades.

params._dataModuleAppManagerAddress: address of the owning app manager

getPauseRules().details: Get the pauseRules data for a given tokenName.

returns._0: pauseRules all the pause rules for the token

isPauseRulesEmpty().details: Return a bool for if the PauseRule array is empty

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proposeOwner(address).details: This function proposes a new owner that is put in storage to be confirmed in a separate process

removePauseRule(uint64,uint64).details: Remove the pause rule from the account. Restricted to the owner

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

version().details: Get the version of the contract

isPauseRulesEmpty().notice: return true if pause rules is empty and return false if array contains rules
